text: læa brrda phu sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa brrda rx sul khxng phraxngkh chn hela nan phwk khea pen phu saty cring læa pen phu seiysla chiwit n thi phracea khxng phwk khea sahrab phwk khea ca di rab rangwal khxng phwk khea læa sængswang khxng phwk khea swn brrda phu ptiseth sraththa læa ptiseth sayyan tang «khxng rea chn hela nan pen chaw nrk
